item.title: How To Set Up GPG On macOS
item.description: This guide covers everything you need to do to get GPG set up on macOS for software development. By the end of this guide, you will accomplish the following: Create a primary GPG key Create an authentication key for use with SSH Create a signing key for git commit signatures Deploy these keys to GitHub Remove the primary private key to follow best practices Some requirements: You have brew installed You have a password manager set up What is GPG GNU Privacy Guard (GPG) is an encryption software that enables secure communication and data storage.
